attributes.description:
2014 AUDI A6 3.0 TDI QUATTRO (180KW) S-LINE, FULL SERVICE HISTORY, IMMACULATE CONDITION, 138 000 KM’S, R 329 950.00
When you first look at this vehicle, its looks quite large from the outside, the interior looks very nice and spacious, the cabin is an awesome place to be in, lots of features and options in terms of driving style, comfort settings, and just about any other feature you can think of. This is my eyes is a proper luxury sedan, it’s a fantastic family vehicle. And that’s pretty much what you think of when you look at it, and you also expect it to drive like a big sedan all slow and sluggish top heavy around corners etc. well let me just tell you about the complete opposite, 
I must say from the start that this car really surprised me, it’s a proper wolf in sheep’s clothing. You just do not expect this car to be so powerful and such a good drive with the full-time all-wheel drive. The 8 speed gear box is very nice, quick smooth changes, when you engage it into sports mode and accelerate the 500 Nm and 180 Kw gets going quickly for such a big car. Please do not compare this to the 2.0 TDI version, there is no comparison and once you go for a test drive you will understand exactly what I mean and in saying all of the above about the performance you can also drive it every day in comfort or eco mode and get 7.2 litres per 100 Km’s and really enjoy her, 
When this 3.0 TDI S-Line was purchased new there were a lot of special order items on this particular model. 
WHY IS THIS CAR SPECIAL? 
•	Factory S-Line Seats
•	Factory S-Line steering wheel
•	Full Service history
•	Lots of extra’s
•	Satellite navigation 
•	Sun Roof 
•	All 4 Goodyear’s are in excellent condition 
•	Front and rear PDC 
•	7.2 l/100km Light on diesel 
•	Original medical kit still intact 
•	Audi rubber interior matts including boot
•	Electric memory seats 
•	4x4 full-time (all-wheel drive permanent, locking centre differential, 40/60 torque split)
•	Key less go
This is one of the best luxury sedans I have driven in a long time, it’s got everything you need and more. Very underrated. Please come through and see her in person and let’s go for a drive around the block and get a good long test drive in, you will not be sorry.
